member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.Domain
member.summary: Domain

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.RecordType
member.summary: Record type, which is obtained through the record type API. The value contains uppercase letters, such as `A`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.RecordLine
member.summary: Record split zone, which is obtained through the record split zone API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.Value
member.summary: Record value, such as `IP : 200.200.200.200`, `CNAME : cname.dnspod.com`, and `MX : mail.dnspod.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.DomainId
member.summary: Domain ID. The `DomainId` parameter has a higher priority than `Domain`. If `DomainId` is passed in, `Domain` will be ignored.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.SubDomain
member.summary: Host record such as `www`. If it is not passed in, it will be `@` by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.RecordLineId
member.summary: Split zone ID, which is obtained through the record split zone API. The value is a string such as `10=1`. The `RecordLineId` parameter has a higher priority than `RecordLine`. If both of them are passed in, `RecordLineId` will be used first.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.MX
member.summary: MX priority, which is required for an MX record and will take effect if the record type is MX. Value range: 1–20.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.TTL
member.summary: TTL. Value range: 1–604800. The minimum value varies by domain level.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.Weight
member.summary: Weight information, which is an integer between 0 and 100. It is supported only for enterprise VIP domains. `0` indicates not to pass in this parameter, i.e., not to set the weight.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.CreateRecordRequest.Status
member.summary: Initial status of the record. Valid values: ENABLE, DISABLE. Default value: ENABLE. If `DISABLE` is passed in, the DNS record won't take effect, and the limit on round-robin DNS won't be verified.

member.summary: Domain

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.RecordType
member.summary: Record type, which is obtained through the record type API. The value contains uppercase letters, such as `A`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.RecordLine
member.summary: Record split zone, which is obtained through the record split zone API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.Value
member.summary: Record value, such as `IP : 200.200.200.200`, `CNAME : cname.dnspod.com`, and `MX : mail.dnspod.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.RecordId
member.summary: The record ID. You can view all DNS records and their IDs via the `DescribeRecordList` API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.DomainId
member.summary: The domain ID. `DomainId` takes priority over `Domain`. If `DomainId` is passed in, `Domain` is ignored. You can view all `Domain` and `DomainId` values via the `DescribeDomainList` API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.SubDomain
member.summary: Host record such as `www`. If it is not passed in, it will be `@` by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.RecordLineId
member.summary: Split zone ID, which is obtained through the record split zone API. The value is a string such as `10=1`. The `RecordLineId` parameter has a higher priority than `RecordLine`. If both of them are passed in, `RecordLineId` will be used first.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.MX
member.summary: MX priority, which is required for an MX record and will take effect if the record type is MX. Value range: 1–20.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.TTL
member.summary: TTL. Value range: 1–604800. The minimum value varies by domain level.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.Weight
member.summary: Weight information, which is an integer between 0 and 100. It is supported only for enterprise VIP domains. `0` indicates not to pass in this parameter, i.e., not to set the weight.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dnspod.V20210323.Models.ModifyRecordRequest.Status
member.summary: Initial status of the record. Valid values: ENABLE, DISABLE. Default value: ENABLE. If `DISABLE` is passed in, the DNS record won't take effect, and the limit on round-robin DNS won't be verified.
